params.balanceBefore: Asset balance of the strategy before withdrawing
params.investedAssetsUSD: Expected amount in USD, decimals are same to {_asset}

returns.balance: Current asset balance of the strategy

onlyPlatformVoter(address).details: Restrict access only for platform voter

checkWithdrawImpact(address,uint256,uint.notice: Calculate withdrawn amount in USD using the {assetPrice}.         Revert if the amount is different from expected too much (high price impact)
